# The data

## Importing Geospatial data

```{r}
hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/",
                 layer = "Hunan")
  
```

## Importing Aspatial data

```{r}
hunan_2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
